analysis.purpose: Coordinate scheduling for a potential meeting on Monday after Deepak Chopra's prior commitments

analysis.summary: Deepak Chopra responds to an invitation from J to join lunch with George Church at Harvard on Sunday, indicating he will arrive very late due to prior filming commitments with Al Gore and suggesting they connect on Monday instead.
